column4: yea no shit... but this a production system that ive trusted ubuntu on for some 8 years.. all of a sudden, without any prevocation or major changes, the thing wants to stand on its head like a loony patient even after complete system reinstall and hdd swap. im really pissed cause i was just starting to like 10.04...
I haven't much cared for it yet
you should get your money back for sure
shut up ok.. im in no mood to be toyed with.
